feed.title: Panagiotis Andriotis
feed.subtitle: Panagiotis Andriotis is an Assistant Professor in Forensic Computing ansSecurity and a GIAC Certified Forensic Examiner (GIAC GCFE, GIAC GASF).

entry.title: Welcome to my new personal space

link.title: Welcome to my new personal space

entry.content:
Theros: /ˈθe.ɾos/, is a Greek world for “summer”.
I like to use it also as a nickname.

This site is my first attempt to use jekyll and the al-folio theme.
entry.summary: Theros: /ˈθe.ɾos/, is a Greek world for “summer”. I like to use it also as a nickname.
